EmailTemplate.name: Hold on Matching - Wave 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps: Application Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Fellow_Application__c.Applicant_First_Name__c},
After careful consideration of all candidates, we have narrowed the pool of finalists we are considering for the next round of offers. We have decided to waitlist your application. However, because you meet many of our preferred fellowship qualifications, we will consider your application as spots become available on a rolling basis.
While we cannot guarantee we will be able to place you with a host organization, we hope you will remain in our application pool, which will give us the opportunity to find the right placement for you!
We realize you may have questions as to the reason behind our decision to waitlist your application, but due to the high volume of applications we are unable to provide you with detailed feedback. We encourage you to remain on the waitlist, and we will contact you within a few weeks with an update on your application status.
If you have competing job offer deadlines, please notify us by contacting climatecorpsadmin@ceaconsulting.com.
Best regards,
The Climate Corps Team
*Please do not reply to this email. We will not respond to any inquiries sent to this address. Please follow the instructions above to contact us.
